   16: 
   17: -module(revproxy_SUITE).
   18: -compile(export_all).
   19: 
   20: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   21: 
   22: -include_lib("ejabberd/include/mod_revproxy.hrl").
   23: 
   24: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   25: %% Suite configuration
   26: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   27: 
   28: all() ->
   29:     [{group, compile_routes},
   30:      {group, match_routes},
   31:      {group, generate_upstream},
   32:      {group, requests_http}].
   33: 
   34: groups() ->
   35:     [{compile_routes, [sequence], [compile_example_routes,
   36:                                    example_dynamic_compile]},
   37:      {match_routes, [sequence], [exact_path_match,
   38:                                  remainder_match,
   39:                                  capture_subdomain_match,
   40:                                  method_match,
   41:                                  qs_match,
   42:                                  slash_ending_match]},
   43:      {generate_upstream, [sequence], [upstream_uri,
   44:                                       upstream_host,
   45:                                       upstream_bindings,
   46:                                       upstream_qs,
   47:                                       upstream_slash_path,
   48:                                       upstream_slash_remainder]},
   49:      {requests_http, [sequence], [no_upstreams,
   50:                                   http_upstream,
   51:                                   nomatch_upstream,
   52:                                   https_upstream]}].
   53: 
   54: suite() ->
   55:     [].
   56: 
   57: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   58: %% Init & teardown
   59: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   60: 
   61: -define(APPS, [crypto, ssl, fusco, ranch, cowlib, cowboy]).
   62: 
   63: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   64:     [application:start(App) || App <- ?APPS],
   65:     Pid = create_handler(),
   66:     [{meck_pid, Pid}|Config].
   67: 
   68: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   69:     remove_handler(Config),
   70:     Config.
   71: 
   72: init_per_group(requests_http, Config) ->
   73:     start_revproxy(),
   74:     Config;
   75: init_per_group(match_routes, Config) ->
   76:     Rules = mod_revproxy:compile_routes(example_routes()),
   77:     [{rules, Rules}|Config];
   78: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   79:     Config.
   80: 
   81: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   82:     Config.
   83: 
   84: init_per_testcase(http_upstream, Config) ->
   85:     start_http_upstream(),
   86:     Config;
   87: init_per_testcase(https_upstream, Config) ->
   88:     start_https_upstream(Config),
   89:     Config;
   90: init_per_testcase(_CaseName, Config) ->
   91:     Config.
   92: 
   93: end_per_testcase(http_upstream, Config) ->
   94:     stop_upstream(http_upstream),
   95:     Config;
   96: end_per_testcase(https_upstream, Config) ->
   97:     stop_upstream(https_upstream),
   98:     Config;
   99: end_per_testcase(_CaseName, Config) ->
  100:     Config.
  101: 
  102: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  103: %% Routes compile tests
  104: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  105: compile_example_routes(_Config) ->
  106:     %% Given
  107:     Expected = compiled_example_routes(),
  108: 
  109:     %% When
  110:     Compiled = mod_revproxy:compile_routes(example_routes()),
  111: 
  112:     %% Then
  113:     Expected = Compiled.
  114: 
  115: example_dynamic_compile(_Config) ->
  116:     %% Given
  117:     Expected = compiled_example_routes(),
  118: 
  119:     %% When
  120:     ok = mod_revproxy:compile(example_routes()),
  121: 
  122:     %% Then
  123:     Expected = mod_revproxy_dynamic:rules().
  124: 
  125: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  126: %% HTTP requests tests
  127: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  128: no_upstreams(_Config) ->
  129:     %% Given
  130:     Host = "http://localhost:8080",
  131:     Path = <<"/abc/index.html">>,
  132:     Method = "GET",
  133:     Headers = [{<<"host">>, <<"qwerty.com">>}],
  134:     Body = [],
  135: 
  136:     %% When
  137:     Response = execute_request(Host, Path, Method, Headers, Body),
  138: 
  139:     %% Then
  140:     true = is_status_code(Response, 502).
  141: 
  142: http_upstream(_Config) ->
  143:     %% Given
  144:     Host = "http://localhost:8080",
  145:     QS = <<"ts=1231231232222&st=223232&page=32">>,
  146:     Path = <<"/abc/login.htm?", QS/binary>>,
  147:     Method = "GET",
  148:     Headers = [{<<"host">>, <<"qwerty.com">>}],
  149:     Body = "some example body :)",
  150: 
  151:     %% When
  152:     dbg:tracer(),
  153:     dbg:p(all, c),
  154:     dbg:tpl(mod_revproxy, x),
  155:     Response = execute_request(Host, Path, Method, Headers, Body),
  156:     ct:print("Resp ~p", [Response]),
  157: 
  158:     %% Then
  159:     true = is_status_code(Response, 200),
  160:     true = does_response_match(Response,
  161:                                <<"qwerty.com">>,
  162:                                <<"domain/qwerty/path/abc/login.htm">>,
  163:                                Method,
  164:                                Body,
  165:                                QS),
  166: 
  167:     true = does_contain_header(Response, <<"custom-header-1">>, <<"value">>),
  168:     true = does_contain_header(Response, <<"custom-header-2">>,
  169:                                <<"some other value">>).
  170: 
  171: nomatch_upstream(_Config) ->
  172:     %% Given
  173:     Host = "http://localhost:8080",
  174:     Path = <<"/abc/def">>,
  175:     Method = "GET",
  176:     Headers = [{<<"host">>, <<"domain.net">>}],
  177:     Body = [],
  178: 
  179:     %% When
  180:     Response = execute_request(Host, Path, Method, Headers, Body),
  181: 
  182:     %% Then
  183:     true = is_status_code(Response, 404).
  184: 
  185: https_upstream(_Config) ->
  186:     %% Given
  187:     Host = "http://localhost:8080",
  188:     Path = <<"/admin/index.html">>,
  189:     Method = "POST",
  190:     Headers = [{<<"host">>, <<"otherdomain.com">>}],
  191:     Body = [],
  192: 
  193:     %% When
  194:     Response = execute_request(Host, Path, Method, Headers, Body),
  195:     ct:print("Resp ~p", [Response]),
  196:     %% Then
  197:     true = is_status_code(Response, 200),
  198:     true = does_response_match(Response,
  199:                                <<"otherdomain.com">>,
  200:                                <<"secret_admin/otherdomain/index.html">>,
  201:                                Method,
  202:                                Body,
  203:                                <<>>).
  204: 
  205: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  206: %% Routes matching tests
  207: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  208: exact_path_match(Config) ->
  209:     %% Given
  210:     Rules = ?config(rules, Config),
  211:     Host = <<"domain.com">>,
  212:     Path = <<"/abc">>,
  213:     Method1 = <<"GET">>,
  214:     Method2 = <<"POST">>,
  215: 
  216:     %% When
  217:     Match1 = mod_revproxy:match(Rules, Host, Path, Method1),
  218:     Match2 = mod_revproxy:match(Rules, Host, Path, Method2),
  219: 
  220:     %% Then
  221:     Upstream = #upstream{type = uri,
  222:                          protocol = <<"http://">>,
  223:                          host = [<<"localhost:8080">>]},
  224:     #match{upstream = Upstream} = Match1
  225:                                 = Match2.
  226: 
  227: remainder_match(Config) ->
  228:     %% Given
  229:     Rules = ?config(rules, Config),
  230:     Host = <<"domain.com">>,
  231:     Path1 = <<"/abc/def/ghi/index.html">>,
  232:     Path2 = <<"/def/ghi/index.html">>,
  233:     Method = <<"GET">>,
  234: 
  235:     %% When
  236:     Match1 = mod_revproxy:match(Rules, Host, Path1, Method),
  237:     Match2 = mod_revproxy:match(Rules, Host, Path2, Method),
  238: 
  239:     %% Then
  240:     Upstream1 = #upstream{type = uri,
  241:                           protocol = <<"http://">>,
  242:                           host = [<<"localhost:8080">>]},
  243:     #match{upstream = Upstream1,
  244:            remainder = [<<"def">>, <<"ghi">>, <<"index.html">>],
  245:            path = [<<"abc">>]} = Match1,
  246: 
  247:     Upstream2 = #upstream{type = host,
  248:                           protocol = <<"http://">>,
  249:                           host = [<<"localhost:1234">>]},
  250:     #match{upstream = Upstream2,
  251:            remainder = [<<"def">>, <<"ghi">>, <<"index.html">>],
  252:            path = '_'} = Match2.
  253: 
  254: capture_subdomain_match(Config) ->
  255:     %% Given
  256:     Rules = ?config(rules, Config),
  257:     Host1 = <<"static.domain.com">>,
  258:     Host2 = <<"nonstatic.domain.com">>,
  259:     Path = <<"/a/b/c">>,
  260:     Method = <<"GET">>,
  261: 
  262:     %% When
  263:     Match1 = mod_revproxy:match(Rules, Host1, Path, Method),
  264:     Match2 = mod_revproxy:match(Rules, Host2, Path, Method),
  265: 
  266:     %% Then
  267:     Upstream1 = #upstream{type = uri,
  268:                           protocol = <<"http://">>,
  269:                           host = [<<"localhost:9999">>]},
  270:     #match{upstream = Upstream1,
  271:            remainder = [<<"a">>, <<"b">>, <<"c">>],
  272:            path = '_'} = Match1,
  273: 
  274:     Upstream2 = #upstream{type = uri,
  275:                           protocol = <<"http://">>,
  276:                           host = [<<"localhost:8888">>],
  277:                           path = [whatever, <<>>]},
  278:     #match{upstream = Upstream2,
  279:            remainder = [<<"a">>, <<"b">>, <<"c">>],
  280:            bindings = [{whatever, <<"nonstatic">>}],
  281:            path = []} = Match2.
  282: 
  283: method_match(Config) ->
  284:     %% Given
  285:     Rules = ?config(rules, Config),
  286:     Host = <<"domain.com">>,
  287:     Path = <<"/path/a/b/c">>,
  288:     Method1 = <<"GET">>,
  289:     Method2 = <<"POST">>,
  290: 
  291:     %% When
  292:     Match1 = mod_revproxy:match(Rules, Host, Path, Method1),
  293:     Match2 = mod_revproxy:match(Rules, Host, Path, Method2),
  294: 
  295:     %% Then
  296:     Upstream1 = #upstream{type = host,
  297:                           protocol = <<"http://">>,
  298:                           host = [<<"localhost:1234">>]},
  299:     #match{upstream = Upstream1,
  300:            remainder = [<<"path">>, <<"a">>, <<"b">>, <<"c">>],
  301:            path = '_'} = Match1,
  302: 
  303:     Upstream2 = #upstream{type = uri,
  304:                           protocol = <<"http://">>,
  305:                           host = [<<"localhost:6543">>],
  306:                           path = [<<"detailed_path">>, host, path]},
  307:     #match{upstream = Upstream2,
  308:            remainder = [<<"b">>, <<"c">>],
  309:            bindings = Bindings,
  310:            path = [<<"path">>, path, <<>>]} = Match2,
  311:     <<"domain">> = proplists:get_value(host, Bindings),
  312:     <<"a">> = proplists:get_value(path, Bindings).
  313: 
  314: qs_match(Config) ->
  315:     %% Given
  316:     Rules = ?config(rules, Config),
  317:     Host = <<"dummydomain.com">>,
  318:     QS = <<"login.htm?ts=1231231232222&st=223232&page=32&ap=123442"
  319:             "&whatever=somewordshere">>,
  320:     Path = <<"/a/b/c/", QS/binary>>,
  321:     Method = <<"GET">>,
  322: 
  323:     %% When
  324:     Match = mod_revproxy:match(Rules, Host, Path, Method),
  325: 
  326:     %% Then
  327:     Upstream = #upstream{type = uri,
  328:                          protocol = <<"http://">>,
  329:                          host = [<<"localhost:5678">>],
  330:                          path = [placeholder]},
  331:     #match{upstream = Upstream,
  332:            remainder = [<<"a">>, <<"b">>, <<"c">>, QS],
  333:            bindings = [{placeholder, <<"dummydomain">>}],
  334:            path = '_'} = Match.
  335: 
  336: 
  337: slash_ending_match(Config) ->
  338:     %% Given
  339:     Rules = ?config(rules, Config),
  340:     Host = <<"dummydomain.com">>,
  341:     Path = <<"/a/b/c/">>,
  342:     Method = <<"GET">>,
  343: 
  344:     %% When
  345:     Match = mod_revproxy:match(Rules, Host, Path, Method),
  346: 
  347:     %% Then
  348:     Upstream = #upstream{type = uri,
  349:                          protocol = <<"http://">>,
  350:                          host = [<<"localhost:5678">>],
  351:                          path = [placeholder]},
  352:     #match{upstream = Upstream,
  353:            remainder = [<<"a">>, <<"b">>, <<"c">>, <<>>],
  354:            bindings = [{placeholder, <<"dummydomain">>}],
  355:            path = '_'} = Match.
  356: 
  357: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  358: %% Upstream URI generation
  359: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  360: upstream_uri(_Config) ->
  361:     %% Given
  362:     Upstream = #upstream{type = uri,
  363:                          protocol = <<"http://">>,
  364:                          host = [<<"localhost:8080">>]},
  365:     Remainder = [<<"def">>, <<"index.html">>],
  366:     Bindings = [{host, <<"domain">>}],
  367:     Path = [<<"host">>, host],
  368:     Match = #match{upstream = Upstream,
  369:                    remainder = Remainder,
  370:                    bindings = Bindings,
  371:                    path = Path},
  372: 
  373:     %% When
  374:     URI = mod_revproxy:upstream_uri(Match),
  375: 
  376:     %% Then
  377:     {"http://localhost:8080", <<"/def/index.html">>} = URI.
  378: 
  379: upstream_host(_Config) ->
  380:     %% Given
  381:     Upstream = #upstream{type = host,
  382:                          protocol = <<"http://">>,
  383:                          host = [<<"localhost:8080">>]},
  384:     Remainder = [<<"def">>, <<"index.html">>],
  385:     Bindings = [],
  386:     Path = [<<"host">>],
  387:     Match = #match{upstream = Upstream,
  388:                    remainder = Remainder,
  389:                    bindings = Bindings,
  390:                    path = Path},
  391: 
  392:     %% When
  393:     URI = mod_revproxy:upstream_uri(Match),
  394: 
  395:     %% Then
  396:     {"http://localhost:8080", <<"/host/def/index.html">>} = URI.
  397: 
  398: upstream_bindings(_Config) ->
  399:     %% Given
  400:     Upstream = #upstream{type = uri,
  401:                          protocol = <<"https://">>,
  402:                          host = [domain, host, <<"localhost:8080">>],
  403:                          path = [<<"host">>, host, <<"domain">>, domain]},
  404:     Remainder = [<<"dir">>, <<"index.html">>],
  405:     Bindings = [{host, <<"test_host">>}, {domain, <<"test_domain">>}],
  406:     Path = '_',
  407:     Match = #match{upstream = Upstream,
  408:                    remainder = Remainder,
  409:                    bindings = Bindings,
  410:                    path = Path},
  411: 
  412:     %% When
  413:     URI = mod_revproxy:upstream_uri(Match),
  414: 
  415:     %% Then
  416:     {"https://test_domain.test_host.localhost:8080",
  417:      <<"/host/test_host/domain/test_domain/dir/index.html">>} = URI.
  418: 
  419: upstream_qs(_Config) ->
  420:     %% Given
  421:     Upstream = #upstream{type = uri,
  422:                          protocol = <<"http://">>,
  423:                          host = [<<"localhost:1234">>],
  424:                          path = [<<"ghi">>]},
  425:     Path = [<<"abc">>],
  426:     QS = <<"login.htm?ts=1231231232222&st=223232&page=32&ap=123442"
  427:             "&whatever=somewordshere">>,
  428:     Remainder = [<<"def">>, QS],
  429:     Match = #match{upstream = Upstream,
  430:                    remainder = Remainder,
  431:                    bindings = [],
  432:                    path = Path},
  433: 
  434:     %% When
  435:     URI = mod_revproxy:upstream_uri(Match),
  436: 
  437:     %% Then
  438:     Resource = <<"/ghi/def/", QS/binary>>,
  439:     {"http://localhost:1234", Resource} = URI.
  440: 
  441: upstream_slash_path(_Config) ->
  442:     %% Given
  443:     Upstream = #upstream{type = host,
  444:                          protocol = <<"http://">>,
  445:                          host = [<<"localhost:1234">>],
  446:                          path = [<<"abc">>]},
  447:     Path = [<<"abc">>, <<"def">>, <<>>],
  448:     Match = #match{upstream = Upstream,
  449:                    remainder = [],
  450:                    bindings = [],
  451:                    path = Path},
  452: 
  453:     %% When
  454:     URI = mod_revproxy:upstream_uri(Match),
  455: 
  456:     %% Then
  457:     {"http://localhost:1234", <<"/abc/abc/def/">>} = URI.
  458: 
  459: upstream_slash_remainder(_Config) ->
  460:     %% Given
  461:     Upstream = #upstream{type = host,
  462:                          protocol = <<"http://">>,
  463:                          host = [<<"localhost:1234">>],
  464:                          path = [<<"abc">>]},
  465:     Path = [<<"abc">>, <<"def">>, <<>>],
  466:     Remainder = [<<"ghi">>, <<"jkl">>, <<>>],
  467:     Match = #match{upstream = Upstream,
  468:                    remainder = Remainder,
  469:                    bindings = [],
  470:                    path = Path},
  471: 
  472:     %% When
  473:     URI = mod_revproxy:upstream_uri(Match),
  474: 
  475:     %% Then
  476:     {"http://localhost:1234", <<"/abc/abc/def/ghi/jkl/">>} = URI.
  477: 
  478: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  479: %% Helpers
  480: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  481: example_routes() ->
  482:     [{"domain.com", "/abc", "_", "http://localhost:8080/"},
  483:      {"domain.com", get, "http://localhost:1234"},
  484:      {"static.domain.com", get, "http://localhost:9999/"},
  485:      {":host.com", "/path/:path/", "_",
  486:       "http://localhost:6543/detailed_path/:host/:path"},
  487:      {":placeholder.com", get, "http://localhost:5678/:placeholder"},
  488:      {":whatever.domain.com", "/", "_", "http://localhost:8888/:whatever/"}].
  489: 
  490: compiled_example_routes() ->
  491:     [{[<<"com">>, <<"domain">>], [<<"abc">>], '_',
  492:       #upstream{type = uri,
  493:                 protocol = <<"http://">>,
  494:                 host = [<<"localhost:8080">>]}},
  495:      {[<<"com">>, <<"domain">>], '_', <<"GET">>,
  496:       #upstream{type = host,
  497:                 protocol = <<"http://">>,
  498:                 host = [<<"localhost:1234">>]}},
  499:      {[<<"com">>,<<"domain">>,<<"static">>], '_', <<"GET">>,
  500:       #upstream{type = uri,
  501:                 protocol = <<"http://">>,
  502:                 host = [<<"localhost:9999">>]}},
  503:      {[<<"com">>, host], [<<"path">>, path, <<>>], '_',
  504:       #upstream{type = uri,
  505:                 protocol = <<"http://">>,
  506:                 host = [<<"localhost:6543">>],
  507:                 path = [<<"detailed_path">>, host, path]}},
  508:      {[<<"com">>, placeholder], '_', <<"GET">>,
  509:       #upstream{type = uri,
  510:                 protocol = <<"http://">>,
  511:                 host = [<<"localhost:5678">>],
  512:                 path = [placeholder]}},
  513:      {[<<"com">>, <<"domain">>, whatever], [], '_',
  514:       #upstream{type = uri,
  515:                 protocol = <<"http://">>,
  516:                 host = [<<"localhost:8888">>],
  517:                 path = [whatever, <<>>]}}].
  518: 
  519: start_revproxy() ->
  520:     Routes = {routes, [{":domain.com", "/admin", "_",
  521:                         "https://localhost:5678/secret_admin/:domain/"},
  522:                        {":domain.com", "/:path/", get,
  523:                         "http://:domain.localhost:1234/domain/:domain/path/:path/"}]},
  524:     CustomHeaders = [{<<"custom-header-1">>, <<"value">>},
  525:                      {<<"custom-header-2">>, <<"some other value">>}],
  526:     Dispatch = cowboy_router:compile([
  527:                 {'_',
  528:                  [{"/[...]", mod_revproxy, [{custom_headers, CustomHeaders}]}]}
  529:                 ]),
  530:     mod_revproxy:start(nvm, [Routes]),
  531:     cowboy:start_http(revproxy_listener, 20, [{port, 8080}],
  532:                       [{env, [{dispatch, Dispatch}]}]).
  533: 
  534: start_http_upstream() ->
  535:     Dispatch = cowboy_router:compile([
  536:                 {'_', [{"/[...]", revproxy_handler, []}]}
  537:                 ]),
  538:     cowboy:start_http(http_listener, 20, [{port, 1234}],
  539:                       [{env, [{dispatch, Dispatch}]}]).
  540: 
  541: start_https_upstream(Config) ->
  542:     Dispatch = cowboy_router:compile([
  543:                 {'_', [{"/[...]", revproxy_handler, []}]}
  544:                 ]),
  545:     Opts = [{port, 5678},
  546:             {keyfile, data("server.key", Config)},
  547:             {certfile, data("server.crt", Config)}],
  548:     cowboy:start_https(https_listener, 20, Opts,
  549:                        [{env, [{dispatch, Dispatch}]}]).
  550: 
  551: data(File, Config) ->
  552:     filename:join([?config(data_dir, Config), File]).
  553: 
  554: stop_upstream(Upstream) ->
  555:     cowboy:stop_listener(Upstream).
  556: 
  557: execute_request(Host, Path, Method, Headers, Body) ->
  558:     {ok, Pid} = fusco:start_link(Host, []),
  559:     Response = fusco:request(Pid, Path, Method, Headers, Body, 5000),
  560:     fusco:disconnect(Pid),
  561:     Response.
  562: 
  563: is_status_code({ok, {{CodeBin, _}, _, _, _, _}}, Code) ->
  564:     case binary_to_integer(CodeBin) of
  565:         Code -> true;
  566:         _    -> false
  567:     end.
  568: 
  569: does_response_match({ok, {{_, _}, _, Response, _, _}},
  570:                     Host, Path, Method, Body, QS) ->
  571:     ResponseEls = binary:split(Response, <<"\n">>, [global]),
  572:     [RHost,RMethod,RPath,RBody,RQS|_] = ResponseEls,
  573:     PathSegments = binary:split(Path, <<"/">>, [global, trim]),
  574:     RPath = to_formatted_binary(PathSegments),
  575:     RHost = to_formatted_binary(Host),
  576:     RMethod = to_formatted_binary(list_to_binary(Method)),
  577:     RBody = to_formatted_binary(list_to_binary(Body)),
  578:     RQS = to_formatted_binary(QS),
  579:     true.
  580: 
  581: to_formatted_binary(Subject) ->
  582:     iolist_to_binary(io_lib:format("~p", [Subject])).
  583: 
  584: does_contain_header({ok, {{_, _}, _, Response, _, _}}, Header, Value) ->
  585:     HeaderL = cowboy_bstr:to_lower(Header),
  586:     ValueL = cowboy_bstr:to_lower(Value),
  587:     Match = iolist_to_binary(io_lib:format("~p", [{HeaderL, ValueL}])),
  588:     case binary:match(Response, Match) of
  589:         nomatch -> false;
  590:         _       -> true
  591:     end.
  592: 
  593: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  594: %% revproxy handler mock
  595: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  596: create_handler() ->
  597:     F = fun() ->
  598:             ok = meck:new(revproxy_handler, [non_strict]),
  599:             ok = meck:expect(revproxy_handler, init, fun handler_init/3),
  600:             ok = meck:expect(revproxy_handler, handle, fun handler_handle/2),
  601:             ok = meck:expect(revproxy_handler, terminate, fun handler_terminate/3),
  602:             timer:sleep(infinity)
  603:     end,
  604:     spawn(F).
  605: 
  606: remove_handler(Config) ->
  607:     meck:unload(revproxy_handler),
  608:     exit(?config(meck_pid, Config), kill).
  609: 
  610: handler_init(_Type, Req, _Opts) ->
  611:     {ok, Req, no_state}.
  612: 
  613: handler_handle(Req, State) ->
  614:     {Host, Req2} = cowboy_req:host(Req),
  615:     {PathInfo, Req3} = cowboy_req:path_info(Req2),
  616:     {Method, Req4} = cowboy_req:method(Req3),
  617:     {Headers, Req5} = cowboy_req:headers(Req4),
  618:     ContentType = [{<<"content-type">>, <<"text/plain">>}],
  619:     {Body, Req7} = case cowboy_req:has_body(Req5) of
  620:         false ->
  621:             {<<>>, Req5};
  622:         true ->
  623:             {ok, Body1, Req6} = cowboy_req:body(Req5),
  624:             {Body1, Req6}
  625:     end,
  626:     {QS, Req8} = cowboy_req:qs(Req7),
  627:     Response = io_lib:format("~p~n~p~n~p~n~p~n~p~n~p",
  628:                              [Host, Method, PathInfo, Body, QS, Headers]),
  629:     {ok, Req9} = cowboy_req:reply(200, ContentType, Response, Req8),
  630:     {ok, Req9, State}.
  631: 
  632: handler_terminate(_Reason, _Req, _State) ->
  633:     ok.
